original_title: A Dance Like Starlight: One Ballerina's Dream
overview: Little ballerinas have big dreams. Dreams of pirouettes and grande jetes, dreams of attending the best ballet schools and of dancing starring roles on stage. But in Harlem in the 1950s, dreams don’t always come true—they take a lot of work and a lot of hope. And sometimes hope is hard to come by.
title: A Dance Like Starlight: One Ballerina's Dream
